caption:
In the photograph, three men are engaged in a sunny outdoor setting which features lush foliage and what appears to be a commercial area. One man is depicted from the back, facing the two others; he has light brown hair and wears what looks like a patterned brown blazer. Among the two facing the camera, the one to the left has sandy brown or blond hair and sports aviator sunglasses, a pale suit, and a red tie, while the one on the right has darker hair and wears a casual light shirt with vertically striped earth-toned colors. The darker-haired man is holding fast food items — a hamburger and a drink — which rest on a tray overlaid with a red and white wrapper.

Their conversation seems casual and engaged, suggesting a social or possibly semi-professional interaction amid what might be a lunch break or a casual meet-up. Behind them, other people can be seen milling about, and strikingly contrasted in the background is a dark stone or metal structure with the words "THIRD CENT" partially visible, hinting at the name of a building or location. This setting coupled with the people's attire gives the scene a relaxed yet lively feel, typical of a downtown area in a city during a weekday.
title: Fountain square in downtown Cincinnati is a public square that works for the city and its people in a myriad of ways: lunch
